The word is used in the West to refer to a specific type of Japanese straight, double-edged sword used in antiquity. ==Kusanagi-no-Tsurugi== {{main|Kusanagi}} The current name for the sword which is one of the Three [[Imperial Regalia of Japan]] is "[[Kusanagi-no-Tsurugi]]." ==See also== * [[Japanese sword mountings]] * [[Jian]] {{Japanese (samurai) weapons, armour and equipment}} [[Category:Ancient swords of Japan]] {{japan-culture-stub}} {{weapon-stub}}
